statements: UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', authors = 'John Doe', publication_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_citation_count = 100, publication_topic = 'New Topic' WHERE publication_id = 2;

UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', authors = 'John Doe, Jane Smith', publication_date = '2021-10-15', publication_topic = 'Science', publication_citation_count = 50 WHERE publication_id = 1;

UPDATE research_publications SET publication_date = '2021-11-20', publication_topic = 'Technology', publication_title = 'Updated Title', publication_citation_count = 75, authors = 'Alice Brown, Bob White' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET publication_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE literature SET author = 'Jane Doe', literature_type = 'Novel' WHERE literature_id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET author = 'John Smith', publication_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE title = 'The Great Adventure' AND publication_id = 101;
UPDATE literature SET author = 'Emily Brown', literature_type = 'Poetry', publication_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE literature_id = 201 AND title = 'A Dream in Rhyme';
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'Advanced Machine Learning Techniques' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_topics SET topic_name = 'Natural Language Processing' WHERE topic_id = 2;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_author = 'John Doe' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publication_topics SET topic_id = 2 WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publications SET publication_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'newemail@example.com', affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE publications SET citation_count = 1000, publication_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE author_id = 3;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE author_id = 2;
